amendment.description: Amendment sought to require those receiving section 8 rental assistance for 7 consecutive years to perform a certain amount of work-related activity.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 110-227 to require that all adults in a household receiving Section 8 tenant assistance for more than 7 consecutive years must perform 20 hours per week of approved `work activities.' Exemptions are provided for senior citizens, the disabled, those already exempt from TANF work requirements, and those who cannot access child care.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 222 (Roll no. 627).
